referral_screen.title: Refer & Earn
referral_screen.txt_referral: Refer Your Friend and Earn Bonus Coins
referral_screen.info_referral: You can earn bonus coins by referring friends and sending them the invitation code. After your friend signs up using your referral code, you will earn bonus coins for each referral.
referral_screen.info_you_will: You will receive upto 50 bonus coins.
referral_screen.info_your_friend: Your friend also get upto 100 bonus coins.
referral_screen.info_when_your_friend: When your friends play games, you will earn upto 1% commission.

affiliate_screen.txt_sub_title: Earn Cash While Your Friends and Followers Play!
affiliate_screen.txt_info_works: Affiliate marketing is the process of earning a commission by promoting other people’s (or company’s) products and services. It’s a Coins11 affiliate programme that allows you to earn real money by inviting friends, followers, and community members!
affiliate_screen.txt_one_question: What is the process for becoming an affiliate?
affiliate_screen.txt_one_answer: To join the programme, click the Join Now button and fill out the form.
affiliate_screen.txt_two_question: Who is eligible to take part in this programme?
affiliate_screen.txt_two_answer: Anyone with followers/friends is welcome to participate! If you have WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook groups, Affiliate networks, Influencers, or even individuals as followers!
affiliate_screen.txt_three_question: When will I be able to make money?
affiliate_screen.txt_three_answer: You receive a percentage of the contest entry fee if your invited friend or follower participates in a paid contest.

rules.title: Game Rules
rules.r_1: Knowledge of cryptocurrency and analytical skills are essential.
rules.r_2: The game lasts 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 15 minutes, and 30 minutes.
rules.r_3: To play this game, you must select at least 1 and no more than 11 crypto tokens.
rules.r_4: You must also choose the direction of the token’s price movement.
rules.r_5: Your winning ratio will be determined by your entry fee coins and your choice of price movement direction.

rules.title: Game Rules
rules.r_1: Knowledge of cryptocurrency and analytical skills are essential.
rules.r_2: The game lasts for an hour.
rules.r_3: To play this game, you must first choose 11 crypto tokens.
rules.r_4: You must also choose the direction of the token’s price movement.
rules.r_5: You must also choose C and VC from your 11 crypto token team.
rules.r_6: Positive points will be awarded to the best performing crypto coins that move in the direction you choose.
rules.r_7: Your winning position will be determined by the total number of points scored by your crypto tokens team.

crypto_deposit_screen.title: Deposit {}
crypto_deposit_screen.save_code: save in case there are any issues with your payment
crypto_deposit_screen.txn_note: Make sure to send enough to cover any coin transaction fees!
crypto_deposit_screen.what_to_do_info:
1) Please send {amount} {crypto} to address {address}. (Make sure to send enough to cover any coin transaction fees!) You will need to initiate the payment using your software or online wallet and copy/paste the address and payment amount into it. We will email you when all funds have been received. You have {hh} hours, {mm} minutes, {ss} seconds for us to receive confirmed funds. If you send funds that don't confirm by the timeout or don't send enough coins you will receive an automatic email to claim your funds within 8 hours. If you don't receive the email contact us with the information below and CoinPayments.net will send you a refund:
    i) The transaction ID: {txnid}
    ii) A payment address to send the funds to.
    iii) This verification code: {code} (to verify that you are the transaction sender.)

2) After sending payment, review the status of your transaction on this page. Once the payment is confirmed several times in the block chain, the payment will be completed and the merchant will be notified. The confirmation process usually takes 10-45 minutes but varies based on the coin's target block time and number of block confirms required. The status page is available for the next 30 days.
crypto_deposit_screen.what_to_do_info_two:
1) Please send {amount} {crypto} to address {address} with the Destination Tag set to {tag}. (Make sure to send enough to cover any coin transaction fees!) You will need to initiate the payment using your software or online wallet and copy/paste the address and payment amount into it. We will email you when all funds have been received. You have {hh} hours, {mm} minutes, {ss} seconds for us to receive confirmed funds. If you send funds that don't confirm by the timeout or don't send enough coins you will receive an automatic email to claim your funds within 8 hours. If you don't receive the email contact us with the information below and CoinPayments.net will send you a refund:
    i) The transaction ID: {txnid}
    ii) A payment address to send the funds to.
    iii) This verification code: {code} (to verify that you are the transaction sender.)

2) After sending payment, review the status of your transaction on this page. Once the payment is confirmed several times in the block chain, the payment will be completed and the merchant will be notified. The confirmation process usually takes 10-45 minutes but varies based on the coin's target block time and number of block confirms required. The status page is available for the next 30 days.
crypto_deposit_screen.what_if: What if I accidentally don't send enough?
crypto_deposit_screen.what_if_info: If you don't send enough, that is OK. Just send the remainder and we will combine them for you. You can also send from multiple wallets/accounts.

timeout_screen.support_info: If submitting a support ticket after the 8 hour window make sure to include the following information
